snippet: After announcing that “Moyers & Company” would end in January, the host and his producers received an outpouring of support and lined up new funding.
abstract: After announcing that “Moyers & Company” would end in January, the host and his producers received an outpouring of support and lined up new funding.

headline.main: Bill Moyers Will Stay on TV
headline.print_headline: Bill Moyers Decides to Stick Around
